input.title: Input Data
input.description: Select the input data to be used for the analysis

bam.title: BAM File
bam.description: Select the appropriate BAM file from the input dataset

sample_name.title: Sample Name
sample_name.description: Enter the name of the sample to be used for the analysis

reference.title: Reference Genome
reference.description: Select the reference genome to be used for the analysis

org.title: Organism
org.description: Reference sequence (FASTA) and gene locations (BED) will be sourced from iGenomes

sv.title: Structural Variant Analysis (Sniffles2)
sv.description: If this option is selected, structural variant calling will be carried out using Sniffles2.

snp.title: Small Variant Analysis (Clair3)
snp.description: If this option is selected, small variant calling will be carried out using Clair3.

cnv.title: CNV Analysis
cnv.description: Perform copy number variant calling with either Spectre (default) or QDNAseq.

mod.title: Base Modification Analysis
mod.description: This option is automatically selected and aggregation of modified calls with be carried out using modkit if Ml and Mm tags are found. Disable this option to prevent output of a bedMethyl file.

str.title: STR Analysis (hg38 only)
str.description: If this option is selected, genotyping of STR expansions will be carried out using Straglr. This sub-workflow is only compatible with genome build hg38.

override_basecaller_cfg.title: Basecaller Configuration
override_basecaller_cfg.description: Name of the model to use for selecting a small variant calling model. Select 'autodetect' to infer the model from the headers of the input data.

bam_min_coverage.title: Minimum coverage for BAM file
bam_min_coverage.description: Minimum coverage required for the BAM file to be used in the analysis

phased.title: Perform phasing
phased.description: This option enables phasing of SV, SNP and modifications, depending on which analysis modules have been chosen.

output_gene_summary.title: Generate gene-level coverage summaries
output_gene_summary.description: If set to true, the workflow will generate a list of all genes in the BED and their percentage coverage at a range of thresholds (1x, 10x, 15x, 20x, and 30x), as well as the average coverage of each gene.

igv.title: Visualize outputs in the EPI2ME IGV visualizer
igv.description: Enabling this option will visualize the alignments and VCF files in the EPI2ME desktop app IGV visualizer.

force_strand.title: Require modkit to call strand-aware modifications
force_strand.description: By default strand calls are collapsed (strand reported as '.'). Enabling this will force stranding to be considered when calling modifications, creating one output per modification per strand and the report will be tabulated by both modification and strand.

sex.title: Sex
sex.description: Sex to be passed to Straglr-genotype. The sex determines how many calls will be obtained for all repeats on chrX. If not specified, the workflow will naively attempt to infer whether the sample carries XX or XY based on relative coverage of the allosomes.
